name: Timber_Falls_Motel
text:
Timber Falls Motel
Timber Falls Motel was a motel in Twin Peaks, Washington.
History
Benjamin Horne and Catherine Martell met at the motel to discuss their plans to destroy the Packard Sawmill as Jocelyn Packard spied on them. At the same time, FBI Special Agent Dale Cooper, Sheriff Harry S. Truman, and Deputy Andy Brennan questioned a one-armed shoe salesman named Phillip Gerard about his possible connections to the murder of Laura Palmer.
Behind the scenes
The scenes outside the Timber Falls Motel were shot in the Malibou Lake Mountain Club, a private club located at 29033 Lake Vista Dr. in Agoura Hills, California.
